VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?

VEC.Q: How many segments are in the outermost ring of this sunburst chart?

SRP.Q: Is Vacation Homes positioned outside, inside or on the same side as Commercial Real Estate?
SRP.A: Vacation Homes is positioned {outside} Commercial Real Estate.

VPR.Q: Which top-level category has the highest proportion in this sunburst chart?
VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Residential Property}.

NF.Q: Which categories in the segment Residential Property exceed 100%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Residential Property or Multi-Family Homes?
NC.A: The value of {Residential Property} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Residential Property, Multi-Family Homes, or Commercial Real Estate?
NC.A: The value of {Residential Property} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Multi-Family Homes, Commercial Real Estate, or Rental Market?
NC.A: The value of {Rental Market} is smaller.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Residential Property, Multi-Family Homes, Commercial Real Estate, or Office Buildings?
NC.A: The value of {Residential Property} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Commercial Real Estate to Retail Spaces to Street-Level Shops}.
